00061 static bNode *node_under_mouse(bNodeTree *ntree, int mx, int my)
00062 {
00063     bNode *node;
00064     
00065     for (node=ntree->nodes.last; node; node=node->prev) {
00066         /* node body (header and scale are in other operators) */
00067         if (BLI_in_rctf(&node->totr, mx, my))
00068             return node;
00069     }
00070     return NULL;
00071 }
00072 
00073 static int compare_nodes(bNode *a, bNode *b)
00074 {
00075     bNode *parent;
00076     /* These tell if either the node or any of the parent nodes is selected.
00077      * A selected parent means an unselected node is also in foreground!
00078      */
00079     int a_select=(a->flag & NODE_SELECT), b_select=(b->flag & NODE_SELECT);
00080     int a_active=(a->flag & NODE_ACTIVE), b_active=(b->flag & NODE_ACTIVE);
00081     
00082     /* if one is an ancestor of the other */
00083     /* XXX there might be a better sorting algorithm for stable topological sort, this is O(n^2) worst case */
00084     for (parent = a->parent; parent; parent=parent->parent) {
00085         /* if b is an ancestor, it is always behind a */
00086         if (parent==b)
00087             return 1;
00088         /* any selected ancestor moves the node forward */
00089         if (parent->flag & NODE_ACTIVE)
00090             a_active = 1;
00091         if (parent->flag & NODE_SELECT)
00092             a_select = 1;
00093     }
00094     for (parent = b->parent; parent; parent=parent->parent) {
00095         /* if a is an ancestor, it is always behind b */
00096         if (parent==a)
00097             return 0;
00098         /* any selected ancestor moves the node forward */
00099         if (parent->flag & NODE_ACTIVE)
00100             b_active = 1;
00101         if (parent->flag & NODE_SELECT)
00102             b_select = 1;
00103     }
00104 
00105     /* if one of the nodes is in the background and the other not */
00106     if ((a->flag & NODE_BACKGROUND) && !(b->flag & NODE_BACKGROUND))
00107         return 0;
00108     else if (!(a->flag & NODE_BACKGROUND) && (b->flag & NODE_BACKGROUND))
00109         return 1;
00110     
00111     /* if one has a higher selection state (active > selected > nothing) */
00112     if (!b_active && a_active)
00113         return 1;
00114     else if (!b_select && (a_active || a_select))
00115         return 1;
00116     
00117     return 0;
00118 }
00119 
00120 /* Sorts nodes by selection: unselected nodes first, then selected,
00121  * then the active node at the very end. Relative order is kept intact!
00122  */
00123 static void node_sort(bNodeTree *ntree)
00124 {
00125     /* merge sort is the algorithm of choice here */
00126     bNode *first_a, *first_b, *node_a, *node_b, *tmp;
00127     int totnodes= BLI_countlist(&ntree->nodes);
00128     int k, a, b;
00129     
00130     k = 1;
00131     while (k < totnodes) {
00132         first_a = first_b = ntree->nodes.first;
00133         
00134         do {
00135             /* setup first_b pointer */
00136             for (b=0; b < k && first_b; ++b) {
00137                 first_b = first_b->next;
00138             }
00139             /* all batches merged? */
00140             if (first_b==NULL)
00141                 break;
00142             
00143             /* merge batches */
00144             node_a = first_a;
00145             node_b = first_b;
00146             a = b = 0;
00147             while (a < k && b < k && node_b) {
00148                 if (compare_nodes(node_a, node_b)==0) {
00149                     node_a = node_a->next;
00150                     ++a;
00151                 }
00152                 else {
00153                     tmp = node_b;
00154                     node_b = node_b->next;
00155                     ++b;
00156                     BLI_remlink(&ntree->nodes, tmp);
00157                     BLI_insertlinkbefore(&ntree->nodes, node_a, tmp);
00158                 }
00159             }
00160 
00161             /* setup first pointers for next batch */
00162             first_b = node_b;
00163             for (; b < k; ++b) {
00164                 /* all nodes sorted? */
00165                 if (first_b==NULL)
00166                     break;
00167                 first_b = first_b->next;
00168             }
00169             first_a = first_b;
00170         } while (first_b);
00171         
00172         k = k << 1;
00173     }
00174 }
00175 
00176 void node_select(bNode *node)
00177 {
00178     node->flag |= SELECT;
00179 }
00180 
00181 void node_deselect(bNode *node)
00182 {
00183     bNodeSocket *sock;
00184     
00185     node->flag &= ~SELECT;
00186     
00187     /* deselect sockets too */
00188     for (sock=node->inputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next)
00189         sock->flag &= ~SELECT;
00190     for (sock=node->outputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next)
00191         sock->flag &= ~SELECT;
00192 }
00193 
00194 static void node_toggle(bNode *node)
00195 {
00196     if (node->flag & SELECT)
00197         node_deselect(node);
00198     else
00199         node_select(node);
00200 }
00201 
00202 void node_socket_select(bNode *node, bNodeSocket *sock)
00203 {
00204     sock->flag |= SELECT;
00205     
00206     /* select node too */
00207     if (node)
00208         node->flag |= SELECT;
00209 }
00210 
00211 void node_socket_deselect(bNode *node, bNodeSocket *sock, int deselect_node)
00212 {
00213     sock->flag &= ~SELECT;
00214     
00215     if (node && deselect_node) {
00216         int sel=0;
00217         
00218         /* if no selected sockets remain, also deselect the node */
00219         for (sock=node->inputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next) {
00220             if (sock->flag & SELECT) {
00221                 sel = 1;
00222                 break;
00223             }
00224         }
00225         for (sock=node->outputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next) {
00226             if (sock->flag & SELECT) {
00227                 sel = 1;
00228                 break;
00229             }
00230         }
00231         
00232         if (!sel)
00233             node->flag &= ~SELECT;
00234     }
00235 }
00236 
00237 static void node_socket_toggle(bNode *node, bNodeSocket *sock, int deselect_node)
00238 {
00239     if (sock->flag & SELECT)
00240         node_socket_deselect(node, sock, deselect_node);
00241     else
00242         node_socket_select(node, sock);
00243 }
00244 
00245 /* no undo here! */
00246 void node_deselect_all(SpaceNode *snode)
00247 {
00248     bNode *node;
00249     
00250     for (node= snode->edittree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next)
00251         node_deselect(node);
00252 }
00253 
00254 void node_deselect_all_input_sockets(SpaceNode *snode, int deselect_nodes)
00255 {
00256     bNode *node;
00257     bNodeSocket *sock;
00258     
00259     /* XXX not calling node_socket_deselect here each time, because this does iteration
00260      * over all node sockets internally to check if the node stays selected.
00261      * We can do that more efficiently here.
00262      */
00263     
00264     for (node= snode->edittree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
00265         int sel=0;
00266         
00267         for (sock= node->inputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next)
00268             sock->flag &= ~SELECT;
00269         
00270         /* if no selected sockets remain, also deselect the node */
00271         if (deselect_nodes) {
00272             for (sock= node->outputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next) {
00273                 if (sock->flag & SELECT) {
00274                     sel = 1;
00275                     break;
00276                 }
00277             }
00278             
00279             if (!sel)
00280                 node->flag &= ~SELECT;
00281         }
00282     }
00283     
00284     for (sock= snode->edittree->outputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next)
00285         sock->flag &= ~SELECT;
00286 }
00287 
00288 void node_deselect_all_output_sockets(SpaceNode *snode, int deselect_nodes)
00289 {
00290     bNode *node;
00291     bNodeSocket *sock;
00292     
00293     /* XXX not calling node_socket_deselect here each time, because this does iteration
00294      * over all node sockets internally to check if the node stays selected.
00295      * We can do that more efficiently here.
00296      */
00297     
00298     for (node= snode->edittree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
00299         int sel=0;
00300         
00301         for (sock= node->outputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next)
00302             sock->flag &= ~SELECT;
00303         
00304         /* if no selected sockets remain, also deselect the node */
00305         if (deselect_nodes) {
00306             for (sock= node->inputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next) {
00307                 if (sock->flag & SELECT) {
00308                     sel = 1;
00309                     break;
00310                 }
00311             }
00312             
00313             if (!sel)
00314                 node->flag &= ~SELECT;
00315         }
00316     }
00317     
00318     for (sock= snode->edittree->inputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next)
00319         sock->flag &= ~SELECT;
00320 }
00321 
00322 /* return 1 if we need redraw otherwise zero. */
00323 int node_select_same_type(SpaceNode *snode)
00324 {
00325     bNode *nac, *p;
00326     int redraw;
00327 
00328     /* search for the active node. */
00329     for (nac= snode->edittree->nodes.first; nac; nac= nac->next) {
00330         if (nac->flag & SELECT)
00331             break;
00332     }
00333 
00334     /* no active node, return. */
00335     if (!nac)
00336         return(0);
00337 
00338     redraw= 0;
00339     for (p= snode->edittree->nodes.first; p; p= p->next) {
00340         if (p->type != nac->type && p->flag & SELECT) {
00341             /* if it's selected but different type, unselect */
00342             redraw= 1;
00343             node_deselect(p);
00344         }
00345         else if (p->type == nac->type && (!(p->flag & SELECT))) {
00346             /* if it's the same type and is not selected, select! */
00347             redraw= 1;
00348             node_select(p);
00349         }
00350     }
00351     return(redraw);
00352 }
00353 
00354 /* return 1 if we need redraw, otherwise zero.
00355  * dir can be 0 == next or 0 != prev.
00356  */
00357 int node_select_same_type_np(SpaceNode *snode, int dir)
00358 {
00359     bNode *nac, *p, *tnode;
00360 
00361     /* search the active one. */
00362     for (nac= snode->edittree->nodes.first; nac; nac= nac->next) {
00363         if (nac->flag & SELECT)
00364             break;
00365     }
00366 
00367     /* no active node, return. */
00368     if (!nac)
00369         return(0);
00370 
00371     if (dir == 0)
00372         p= nac->next;
00373     else
00374         p= nac->prev;
00375 
00376     while (p) {
00377         /* Now search the next with the same type. */
00378         if (p->type == nac->type)
00379             break;
00380 
00381         if (dir == 0)
00382             p= p->next;
00383         else
00384             p= p->prev;
00385     }
00386 
00387     if (p) {
00388         for (tnode=snode->edittree->nodes.first; tnode; tnode=tnode->next)
00389             if (tnode!=p)
00390                 node_deselect(tnode);
00391         node_select(p);
00392         return(1);
00393     }
00394     return(0);
00395 }
00396 
00397 void node_select_single(bContext *C, bNode *node)
00398 {
00399     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00400     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00401     bNode *tnode;
00402     
00403     for (tnode=snode->edittree->nodes.first; tnode; tnode=tnode->next)
00404         if (tnode!=node)
00405             node_deselect(tnode);
00406     node_select(node);
00407     
00408     ED_node_set_active(bmain, snode->edittree, node);
00409     
00410     node_sort(snode->edittree);
00411     
00412     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_NODE|NA_SELECTED, NULL);
00413 }
00414 
00415 /* ****** Click Select ****** */
00416  
00417 static int node_mouse_select(Main *bmain, SpaceNode *snode, ARegion *ar, const int mval[2], short extend)
00418 {
00419     bNode *node, *tnode;
00420     bNodeSocket *sock, *tsock;
00421     float mx, my;
00422     int selected = 0;
00423     
00424     /* get mouse coordinates in view2d space */
00425     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, mval[0], mval[1], &mx, &my);
00426     /* node_find_indicated_socket uses snode->mx/my */
00427     snode->mx = mx;
00428     snode->my = my;
00429     
00430     if (extend) {
00431         /* first do socket selection, these generally overlap with nodes.
00432          * socket selection only in extend mode.
00433          */
00434         if (node_find_indicated_socket(snode, &node, &sock, SOCK_IN)) {
00435             node_socket_toggle(node, sock, 1);
00436             selected = 1;
00437         }
00438         else if (node_find_indicated_socket(snode, &node, &sock, SOCK_OUT)) {
00439             if (sock->flag & SELECT) {
00440                 node_socket_deselect(node, sock, 1);
00441             }
00442             else {
00443                 /* only allow one selected output per node, for sensible linking.
00444                  * allows selecting outputs from different nodes though.
00445                  */
00446                 if (node) {
00447                     for (tsock=node->outputs.first; tsock; tsock=tsock->next)
00448                         node_socket_deselect(node, tsock, 1);
00449                 }
00450                 node_socket_select(node, sock);
00451             }
00452             selected = 1;
00453         }
00454         else {
00455             /* find the closest visible node */
00456             node = node_under_mouse(snode->edittree, mx, my);
00457             
00458             if (node) {
00459                 node_toggle(node);
00460                 
00461                 ED_node_set_active(bmain, snode->edittree, node);
00462                 selected = 1;
00463             }
00464         }
00465     }
00466     else {  /* extend==0 */
00467         
00468         /* find the closest visible node */
00469         node = node_under_mouse(snode->edittree, mx, my);
00470         
00471         if (node) {
00472             for (tnode=snode->edittree->nodes.first; tnode; tnode=tnode->next)
00473                 node_deselect(tnode);
00474             node_select(node);
00475             ED_node_set_active(bmain, snode->edittree, node);
00476             selected = 1;
00477         }
00478     }
00479     
00480     /* update node order */
00481     if (selected)
00482         node_sort(snode->edittree);
00483     
00484     return selected;
00485 }
00486 
00487 static int node_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00488 {
00489     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00490     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00491     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00492     int mval[2];
00493     short extend;
00494     
00495     /* get settings from RNA properties for operator */
00496     mval[0] = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "mouse_x");
00497     mval[1] = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "mouse_y");
00498     
00499     extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00500     
00501     /* perform the select */
00502     if (node_mouse_select(bmain, snode, ar, mval, extend)) {
00503         /* send notifiers */
00504         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_NODE|NA_SELECTED, NULL);
00505         
00506         /* allow tweak event to work too */
00507         return OPERATOR_FINISHED|OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00508     }
00509     else {
00510         /* allow tweak event to work too */
00511         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED|OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00512     }
00513 }
00514 
00515 static int node_select_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00516 {
00517     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "mouse_x", event->mval[0]);
00518     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "mouse_y", event->mval[1]);
00519 
00520     return node_select_exec(C,op);
00521 }

00524 void NODE_OT_select(wmOperatorType *ot)
00525 {
00526     /* identifiers */
00527     ot->name = "Select";
00528     ot->idname = "NODE_OT_select";
00529     ot->description = "Select the node under the cursor";
00530     
00531     /* api callbacks */
00532     ot->invoke = node_select_invoke;
00533     ot->poll = ED_operator_node_active;
00534     
00535     /* flags */
00536     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00537     
00538     /* properties */
00539     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "mouse_x", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Mouse X", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
00540     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "mouse_y", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Mouse Y", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
00541     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0, "Extend", "");
00542 }

00544 /* ****** Border Select ****** */
00545 
00546 static int node_borderselect_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00547 {
00548     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00549     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00550     bNode *node;
00551     rcti rect;
00552     rctf rectf;
00553     int gesture_mode= RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode");
00554     int extend= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00555     
00556     rect.xmin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmin");
00557     rect.ymin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymin");
00558     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, rect.xmin, rect.ymin, &rectf.xmin, &rectf.ymin);
00559     
00560     rect.xmax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmax");
00561     rect.ymax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymax");
00562     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, rect.xmax, rect.ymax, &rectf.xmax, &rectf.ymax);
00563     
00564     for (node= snode->edittree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
00565         if (BLI_isect_rctf(&rectf, &node->totr, NULL)) {
00566             if (gesture_mode==GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT)
00567                 node_select(node);
00568             else
00569                 node_deselect(node);
00570         }
00571         else if (!extend) {
00572             node_deselect(node);
00573         }
00574     }
00575     
00576     node_sort(snode->edittree);
00577     
00578     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_NODE|NA_SELECTED, NULL);
00579 
00580     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00581 }
00582 
00583 static int node_border_select_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00584 {
00585     int tweak = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "tweak");
00586     
00587     if (tweak) {
00588         /* prevent initiating the border select if the mouse is over a node */
00589         /* this allows border select on empty space, but drag-translate on nodes */
00590         SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00591         ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00592         float mx, my;
00593 
00594         UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &mx, &my);
00595         
00596         if (node_under_mouse(snode->edittree, mx, my))
00597             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED|OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00598     }
00599     
00600     return WM_border_select_invoke(C, op, event);
00601 }

00615     
00616     ot->poll = ED_operator_node_active;
00617     
00618     /* flags */
00619     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00620     
00621     /* rna */
00622     WM_operator_properties_gesture_border(ot, TRUE);
00623     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "tweak", 0, "Tweak", "Only activate when mouse is not over a node - useful for tweak gesture");
00624 }
00625 
00626 /* ****** Select/Deselect All ****** */
00627 
00628 static int node_select_all_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00629 {
00630     SpaceNode *snode = CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00631     bNode *first = snode->edittree->nodes.first;
00632     bNode *node;
00633     int count= 0;
00634 
00635     for (node=first; node; node=node->next)
00636         if (node->flag & NODE_SELECT)
00637             count++;
00638 
00639     if (count) {
00640         for (node=first; node; node=node->next)
00641             node_deselect(node);
00642     }
00643     else {
00644         for (node=first; node; node=node->next)
00645             node_select(node);
00646     }
00647     
00648     node_sort(snode->edittree);
00649     
00650     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_NODE|NA_SELECTED, NULL);
00651     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00652 }
00653 
00654 void NODE_OT_select_all(wmOperatorType *ot)
00655 {
00656     /* identifiers */
00657     ot->name = "(De)select All";
00658     ot->description = "(De)select all nodes";
00659     ot->idname = "NODE_OT_select_all";
00660     
00661     /* api callbacks */
00662     ot->exec = node_select_all_exec;
00663     ot->poll = ED_operator_node_active;
00664     
00665     /* flags */
00666     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00667 }
00668 
00669 /* ****** Select Linked To ****** */
00670 
00671 static int node_select_linked_to_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00672 {
00673     SpaceNode *snode = CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00674     bNodeLink *link;
00675     bNode *node;
00676     
00677     for (node=snode->edittree->nodes.first; node; node=node->next)
00678         node->flag &= ~NODE_TEST;
00679 
00680     for (link=snode->edittree->links.first; link; link=link->next) {
00681         if (link->fromnode && link->tonode && (link->fromnode->flag & NODE_SELECT))
00682             link->tonode->flag |= NODE_TEST;
00683     }
00684     
00685     for (node=snode->edittree->nodes.first; node; node=node->next) {
00686         if (node->flag & NODE_TEST)
00687             node_select(node);
00688     }
00689     
00690     node_sort(snode->edittree);
00691     
00692     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_NODE|NA_SELECTED, NULL);
00693     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00694 }
00695 
00696 void NODE_OT_select_linked_to(wmOperatorType *ot)
00697 {
00698     /* identifiers */
00699     ot->name = "Select Linked To";
00700     ot->description = "Select nodes linked to the selected ones";
00701     ot->idname = "NODE_OT_select_linked_to";
00702     
00703     /* api callbacks */
00704     ot->exec = node_select_linked_to_exec;
00705     ot->poll = ED_operator_node_active;
00706     
00707     /* flags */
00708     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00709 }

00720         node->flag &= ~NODE_TEST;
00721 
00722     for (link=snode->edittree->links.first; link; link=link->next) {
00723         if (link->fromnode && link->tonode && (link->tonode->flag & NODE_SELECT))
00724             link->fromnode->flag |= NODE_TEST;
